author: Nick Nairn
method: Slice the sea bass fillet thinly on the diagonal using a very sharp knife.  Spread out the bass slices on a plate and sprinkle over the lime zest and juice, sugar and vegetable oil. Season, to taste, with salt and freshly ground black pepper. Set aside to marinate in a cool place for about 15 minutes, but do not leave any longer or the fish flesh will begin to break down. Serve immediately.
